title: Help my account got hacked and now I'm banned for a few weeks
body: OK, so these are my last few days to play league. After about a week of playing, I opened up my client a got a message saying I got banned see game 1. I click on the link and it showed a game as jax, I dont even play him. I am almost 100% sure that my account got hacked, even thought I have never told anyone my password, I don't even play jax. Can someone please tell me how I can contact riot games and get my account fixed before the end of the summer when I cannot play anymore? Thank you in advanced

replies.body: We can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will review your case and help with restoring access back to your hands.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
thank you! do you know how long it takes riot to respond?

Depends on the volume of our queue, but it may be a few moments.  Make sure not to reply to your ticket, or bumping it, as that can drop you back to the bottom of the queue.  Hang tight until a specialist gets back to you!
